query:
SELECT a.id as alunoId, a.name, p.name as programa, 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mentoring_sessions ms WHERE ms.alunoId = a.id) as totalSessions,
  (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(ms.sessionNumber) FROM mentoring_sessions ms WHERE ms.alunoId = a.id) as sessionNumbers
FROM alunos a 
LEFT JOIN programs p ON p.id = a.programId
WHERE a.name LIKE '%Amaggeldo%'
command:

  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mentoring_sessions ms WHERE ms.alunoId = a.id) as totalSessions,
  (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(ms.sessionNumber) FROM mentoring_sessions ms WHERE ms.alunoId = a.id) as sessionNumbers
FROM alunos a 
LEFT JOIN programs p ON p.id = a.programId
WHERE a.name LIKE '%Amaggeldo%'
